'''Restaurants''' are [[shop]]s that primarily sell [[food]], [[recipe]]s, and ingredients.

==Main Restaurants==
Main restaurants appear on the minimap with a restaurant icon. They contain [[stove]]s, seating, and vendors. These are located within or close to the [[Main City]] of an area.

==Other Restaurants==
Within and outside of the main city are other shops that sell local specialties and foods. These include [[Xinyue Kiosk]] and [[Angel's Share]] among others. These restaurants may be missing elements that main restaurants will have, such as a stove.
